component.name: VirtUI Manager
component.summary: Terminal-based interface to manage virtual machines using libvirt

description.p: VirtUI Manager is a Terminal User Interface (TUI) for managing virtual machines. It uses libvirt to communicate with local or remote hypervisors (KVM/QEMU).

ul.li: Manage VM lifecycle (start, stop, pause, resume)
Configure VM hardware (CPU, Memory, Disks, Networks)
Access VM console via Web Console (noVNC) or Remote Viewer
Perform bulk operations on multiple VMs
